rooms.description: A spacious foyer with Vastu alignment ensuring energy flow; positioned on the western side to welcome positive energies.
A large, open living space designed in a brutalist style using raw concrete finishes. Features minimalistic decor and ample natural light via strategically placed openings.
Adjacent to the living room with an extended window for views, ensuring a harmonious space in line with Vastu's emphasis on communal dining areas.
Located on the south side of the penthouse floor for restful sleep and privacy; includes built-in storage and minimalistic design in line with brutalist aesthetics.
A secondary bedroom featuring functional design and adequate ventilation to maintain Vastu principles of balanced energies.
Efficient kitchen space designed with open shelving and a central island; positioned for easy access from the dining area while respecting Vastu's fire element guidelines.
Modern bathroom integrated into the living quarter with privacy, ensuring proper water drainage and alignment to Vastu by placing it away from entrance areas.

openings.location: North and East walls of the Living Room and Bedrooms
openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, maintaining a connection with nature as per Vastu guidelines.
Sturdy reinforced concrete door ensuring security while adhering to Brutalist design principles.

openings.location: Adjacent to the Master Bedroom and Guest Bedroom
openings.description: Provides access to a central courtyard, blending indoor-outdoor living with Vastu harmony and brutalist aesthetic.

rooftop_terrace.description: A spacious terrace for relaxation and social gatherings, designed with minimalist brutalist elements and incorporating green spaces in line with sustainable design principles.

central_courtyard.description: An internal courtyard that promotes natural light and ventilation throughout the building, aligning with Vastu principles by allowing balanced energy flow within the penthouse.
